info.author: Philippe Lagadec
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
ORIGAPY module:

origapy is a Python module to clean PDF files by disabling active content 
(javascript, launch, etc), using the Ruby Origami PDF parser.

It includes a partial version of the origami PDF parser.

origapy website: http://www.decalage.info/python/origapy
origami website: http://www.security-labs.org/origami


REQUIREMENTS:

- Python v2.x
- Ruby v1.8.x


INSTALLATION:

- on Windows, launch install.bat
- on other systems, launch: setup.py install



HOW TO USE THIS MODULE:

import origapy
pc = origapy.PDF_Cleaner()
pc.clean('file.pdf', 'cleaned.pdf')


See also the main code at the end of the module, and docstrings.



LICENSE:

GPL v3 - See COPYING.txt.

AUTHOR:

Philippe Lagadec - http://www.decalage.info
